section1.desc1: 开源向量相似度搜索引擎

section2.title: 什么是 Milvus
section2.content: Milvus 是一款开源的、针对海量特征向量的相似性搜索引擎。基于异构众核计算框架设计，成本更低，性能更好。 在有限的计算资源下，十亿向量搜索仅毫秒响应。Milvus 能够广泛应用于各种 AI 场景，为 AI 发展提供有效助力。

list.title: Multi-model Support
list.content: Milvus is designed with heterogeneous computing architecture for the best performance and cost efficiency.

list.title: High Performence
list.content: Milvus supports a variety of indexing types that employs quantization, tree-based, and graph indexing techniques.

list.title: Near Real-time Search
list.content: Milvus automatically adapts search computation and index building processes based on your datasets and available resources.

list.title: CRUD
list.content: Milvus supports online / offline expansion to scale both storage and computation resources with simple commands.

list.title: Hybrid Search
list.content: Milvus is integrated with Kubernetes framework so that all single point of failures could be avoided.

list.title: High Availability
list.content: Milvus can be easily installed in a few steps and supports Prometheus-based GUI monitor dashboards.

list.title: Scalable
list.content: Milvus can be easily installed in a few steps and supports Prometheus-based GUI monitor dashboards.

list.title: Cost Efficient
list.content: Milvus can be easily installed in a few steps and supports Prometheus-based GUI monitor dashboards.

list.title: Cloud Native
list.content: Milvus can be easily installed in a few steps and supports Prometheus-based GUI monitor dashboards.

section5.title: 应用场景
section5.desc: Step-by-step instructions to solve AI problems with Milvus.

img1.title: 以图搜图
